TopicTitle: What Happened To The Mun Texture?

Articles.Content: The Mun's texture now looks stretched out in .25...

Apparently it's not just Mun surface. Someone found that Kerbin desert texture got the same problem, and it's most likely not the only one.

Someone also said that the Kerbin desert texture is just a Kerbin grass texture colored yellow and bugged o_O.

Apparently it's not just Mun surface. Someone found that Kerbin desert texture got the same problem, and it's most likely not the only one.

Someone also said that the Kerbin desert texture is just a Kerbin grass texture colored yellow and bugged o_O.

Unity engine for dummies v1

This stretching has to do with the new terrain system that was used for Kerbin, Mun and possibly a few other celestial bodies. The texture stretches with the terrain elevation. A fix was attempted before release but it didn't quite work and the bug wasn't deemed serious enough to warrant postponing the schedule. And I think that's a fair call Squad will be working on this system in future updates so I expect this bug will be fixed as well.
Hopefully this will be fixed in .26 or an earlier patch...
Yup still no fix for this ugly bug and now I've noticed the surface textures flickering too.. What da fork?

On 10/10/2014 at 3:40 AM, KasperVld said:

 Squad will be working on this system in future updates so I expect this bug will be fixed as well.

Well, this probably mean that the update that contains this will be a mod-crasher...

Holy two-year necro, Batman!

 

... is this still the same issue? Is it a bug? Or did they just replace the mun texture with an uglier one?
I see this issue on Kerbin though I haven't pinned down the cause yet. Seems to happen randomly.
They really should do a graphics update for 1.3
